resources.string:
Welcome to iList.

In this app you would be able to create your personal lists.

There are also some nice features you can also use such as:

1. Share your lists via whatsapp

2. Receive new list by SMS and automatically save it to your lists

In order to do this, the message must be in the following format:

List *list name*

-ItemName1:Amount

-ItemName2:Amount

and so on

3. Set a reminder when do you want to use your lists

We hope you will enjoy using the App and wish you the best
